message_1: In a one-time pad encryption, Alice wants to send a secret message "10111010" to Bob. Alice generates a random key "10010011" of the same length as the message. What is the encrypted message that Alice should send to Bob using the one-time pad encryption method?
message_2:
To encrypt the message using the one-time pad encryption method, Alice needs to perform a bitwise XOR operation between the message and the random key. 

Message: 10111010
Key:     10010011
-------------------
XOR:     00101001

So, the encrypted message that Alice should send to Bob is "00101001".
